q1.question: Is it really free to listen to radio on Rradio?
q1.answer: Yes, Rradio is 100% free. You can listen to all radio stations at no cost, with no time limits and no need to register. Simply choose your favorite station and start listening.

q2.question: Do I need to download anything to listen to radio?
q2.answer: You don't need to download any app. Rradio works directly in your web browser. However, you can also install the progressive web app (PWA) on your device for faster access.

q3.question: How many radio stations are available?
q3.answer: We have over 30,000 radio stations from around the world. We cover all music genres, news, sports, podcasts and more. We constantly add new stations to offer you the best variety.

q4.question: Can I listen to stations from other countries?
q4.answer: Of course! Rradio allows you to listen to stations from over 200 countries. Discover music and culture from around the world, from local radios to the most popular international stations.

q5.question: How do I save my favorite stations?
q5.answer: It's very easy. Just click the heart icon ‚ù§Ô∏è on any station to add it to your favorites. You can access them quickly from the 'Favorites' section in the navigation menu.

unlimitedListening.description: Listen as much as you want without time or skip restrictions.

multiDevice.title: Multi-device sync
multiDevice.description: Your favorites and settings synced across all your devices.

trial.question: How does the free trial work?
trial.answer: You get 7 days of full Premium access at no charge. You can cancel anytime during the trial period and you won't be charged anything. If you decide to continue, payment will begin after the 7 days.

cancel.question: Can I cancel my subscription?
cancel.answer: Yes, you can cancel at any time from your account. There are no long-term commitments. If you cancel, you'll continue to have Premium access until the end of the period you already paid for.

payment.question: What payment methods do you accept?
payment.answer: We accept all major credit and debit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express), as well as PayPal and other local payment methods through Stripe.

changePlan.question: Can I change from monthly to annual plan?
changePlan.answer: Yes, you can change your plan at any time from your account settings. If you change to annual, you'll receive a prorated credit from your monthly plan.

taxes.question: Does the price include taxes?
taxes.answer: Prices shown may vary depending on your location due to local taxes. The final price with taxes will be shown before confirming payment.

multiDevice.question: Can I use Premium on multiple devices?
multiDevice.answer: Yes, you can use your Premium account on all your devices (mobile, tablet, desktop). You can only have one active session playing content at a time.

data.question: What happens to my data if I cancel?
data.answer: All your favorites, settings, and account data remain saved. If you resubscribe later, everything will be as you left it.

student.question: Do you offer student discounts?
student.answer: We're currently working on a special plan for students. Subscribe to our newsletter to be the first to know when it's available.

success.title: Welcome to Premium!
success.subtitle: Your subscription is active and ready to use
success.confirmationNote: You'll receive a confirmation email with your subscription details. You can manage your subscription from your account at any time.

radioOnline.title: Free Online Radio - Listen to 30,000+ Stations | Complete 2026 Guide
radioOnline.description: Discover the best free online radio platform. Connect with local culture from 200+ countries. Music, news, live sports. No downloads.
radioOnline.h1: Online Radio: Your Window to the World
radioOnline.subtitle: Listen to over 30,000 radio stations from around the world. Free, no downloads, live.

intro.title: What is Online Radio?
intro.content:
The **online radio** is much more than an audio streaming service. It's your direct connection to the cultural authenticity of anywhere in the world. While AI-generated playlists offer you predictable music, online radio immerses you in the real experience of being there.

Listening to a local radio from Buenos Aires, Tokyo, or Paris instantly transports you. You hear the same ads as locals, the same breaking news, the same DJ that accompanies millions in their daily routine. **It's not just music, it's real-time human connection**.

benefits.title: Why Online Radio Beats AI Playlists

authenticity.title: üåç Real Cultural Authenticity
authenticity.description: No algorithms. Listen to what really plays on the streets of Madrid, New York, or Tokyo. Connect with local culture authentically.

human.title: üéôÔ∏è Human Content, Not Robots
human.description: Real DJs, passionate hosts, live debates. Online radio connects you with people, not cold algorithms.

discovery.title: üìª Genuine Discovery
discovery.description: Find music you would never search for. Local DJs introduce you to emerging artists before Spotify or YouTube.

free.title: üÜì 100% Free, Unlimited
free.description: Unlike premium streaming services, online radio is completely free. No subscriptions, no invasive ads.

how.title: How Online Radio Works
how.content:
The technology behind online radio is surprisingly simple yet powerful. Stations broadcast their audio signal over the internet using streaming protocols like HLS, Icecast, or Shoutcast.

**Technical advantages:**
- Superior audio quality (up to 320kbps, better than FM)
- No interference or static noise
- Global access from any device
- Compatible with modern browsers, no apps needed

All you need is an internet connection and the desire to explore the world through sound.

cultural.title: Radio as a Cultural Bridge
cultural.content:
At Rradio, we believe online radio is the most authentic way to experience a foreign culture without leaving home.

**Real use cases:**

- **Language learning**: Listen to French radio while cooking. It's more effective than any language app because it's real content, not pedagogical scripts.

- **Expats and nostalgia**: Thousands of users listen to radio from their home country to feel closer. The familiar accent, local news, the music you grew up with.

- **Virtual travelers**: Plan your next trip by listening to local radio. Discover what music is trending, what events are being discussed, how that place really sounds.

Online radio doesn't just transmit audio, it transmits **atmosphere, emotion, and culture in its purest form**.

genres.title: Explore by Music Genre
genres.description: From classic rock to experimental electronic music. Find the perfect sound for every moment.

countries.title: Online Radio by Country
countries.description: Travel sonically around the world. Each country has its own musical and cultural identity.

free.q: Is it really free to listen to online radio?
free.a: Yes, 100% free. Unlike Spotify or Apple Music, online radio doesn't require a premium subscription. Stations are funded by local advertising, not your money.

app.q: Do I need to download an app?
app.a: No. Rradio works directly in your web browser. However, you can install our PWA for faster access.

countries.q: Can I listen to radio from other countries?
countries.a: Of course! That's the magic of online radio. Listen to stations from over 200 countries. No borders, no restrictions.

spotify.q: What's the difference between online radio and Spotify?
spotify.a: Spotify uses algorithms to create personalized playlists. Online radio connects you with real human content: DJs, live news, local events. It's the difference between a restaurant with a chef and a microwave.

cta.title: Start Your Sound Journey
cta.description: Explore over 30,000 radio stations from around the world. Free, no registration.
